name: dynamodb-dashboard
description: DynamoDB Dashboard is a web UI for visualizing and inspecting AWS DynamoDB tables. It helps developers browse items, run queries, and understand data structures without relying solely on the AWS console.

features.title: Table Browsing
features.description: View all DynamoDB tables in your AWS account with item counts and key schema information

features.title: Item Inspection
features.description: Browse table contents with pagination and view individual items with all attributes displayed

features.title: Query Builder
features.description: Construct queries using partition and sort keys with filter expressions for targeted data retrieval

features.title: Scan Operations
features.description: Perform full table scans with optional filters to explore data without predefined access patterns

features.title: Json Formatting
features.description: Display item data in readable JSON format for easier analysis of complex nested structures

features.title: Aws Credential Support
features.description: Connect using IAM roles, access keys, or environment variables for flexible authentication

features.title: Local Development
features.description: Test against DynamoDB Local or production tables from a unified interface during development

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Run as a simple web application without heavy dependencies or complex setup requirements
